configuration.value:
apiVersion: install.istio.io/v1alpha1
kind: IstioOperator
metadata:
  namespace: istio-system
spec:
  components:
   # Istio Gateway feature
    ingressGateways:
    - name: istio-ingressgateway
      k8s:
        hpaSpec:
          minReplicas: 3
          maxReplicas: 10
        strategy:
          rollingUpdate:
            maxSurge: 50%
            maxUnavailable: 1
    pilot:
      k8s:
        affinity:
          podAntiAffinity:
            preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            - weight: 100
              podAffinityTerm:
                labelSelector:
                  matchExpressions:
                  - key: app
                    operator: In
                    values:
                    - istiod
                topologyKey: "kubernetes.io/hostname"
        hpaSpec:
          minReplicas: 2
          maxReplicas: 5
        strategy:
          rollingUpdate:
            maxSurge: 50%
            maxUnavailable: 1
  values:
    global:
      proxy:
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 192Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
    pilot:
      autoscaleMin: 2
      autoscaleMax: 5

math.randomseed(os.time())
local random = math.random
local function uuid()
    local template ='xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'
    return string.gsub(template, '[xy]', function(c)
        local v = (c == 'x') and random(0, 0xf) or random(8, 0xb)
        return string.format('%x', v)
    end)
end
function reformat(tag, timestamp, record)
    payload = record["log"]
    mpsTenant = "85ed5dcb-1b79-4ba6-b9c6-fbce36d41536"
    customerTenant = "f7d129fa-b2fe-11eb-8529-0242ac130003"
    new_payload = "{\"id\": {\"externalTenant\": \"" .. customerTenant .. "\"},\"reason\":" .. record["log"] .. "}"
    new_record = {}
    new_record["type"] = "object"
    new_record["description"] = "Dex log record"
    new_record["time"] = payload:match("\"time\":\"(.-)\"")
    new_record["user"] = payload:match("email=\\\"(.-)\\\"") or "systemuser"
    new_record["tenant"] = mpsTenant
    new_record["uuid"] = uuid()
    new_record["data"] = new_payload
    return 1, 0, new_record
end

[INPUT]
    Name              tail
    Tag               dex.*
    Path              /var/log/containers/*_dex-*.log
    DB                /var/log/flb_kube_dex.db
    parser            docker
    Mem_Buf_Limit     5MB
    Skip_Long_Lines   On
    Refresh_Interval  10
[FILTER]
    Name    lua
    Match   dex.*
    script  script.lua
    call    reformat
[FILTER]
    Name    grep
    Match   dex.*
    Regex   time .*
[FILTER]
    Name    grep
    Match   dex.*
    Regex   data .*\"xsuaa
[OUTPUT]
    Name             http
    Match            dex.*
    Retry_Limit      False
    Host             api.auditlog.cf.stagingaws.hanavlab.ondemand.com
    Port             8081
    URI              /audit-log/v2/security-events
    Header           Content-Type application/json
    HTTP_User        ${AUDITLOG_USER}
    HTTP_Passwd      ${AUDITLOG_PASSWD}
    Format           json_stream
    tls              on

kubeConfig:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Config
current-context: shoot--wookiee--rafal
contexts:
  - name: shoot--wookiee--rafal
    context:
      cluster: shoot--wookiee--rafal
      user: shoot--wookiee--rafal-token
clusters:
  - name: shoot--wookiee--rafal
    cluster:
      server: 'https://api.rafal.wookiee.shoot.canary.k8s-hana.ondemand.com'
      certificate-authority-data: >-
        
users:
  - name: shoot--wookiee--rafal-token
    user:
      token: >-
        qGJC5t1Zp4y5cY6kngGVcwOMGRHwpMCZSTL5uc2ZqNbwEuIBpI9mrxVORqvWFDDhKB21D2KHHVeAMGrpxCRDr8yd5XzYfYehDVfLGKwVtHKO07XdR5Kwjk8L0zDhi4L6
